full_sentence: Why is everyone celebrating this nonsense? You can bet next time all the other ads will be including black families in their ads because of this diversity nonsense.
Actually, he makes the pharaoh choose to continue not free the Jews which justifies him sending plagues. God loves a good plague, you can see by covid.

They are taught that Jews are the Chosen People of God and that there is something different about them, a sacred mystical quality to their DNA which makes them different from the rest of humanity; essentially they are admitting that they are Aliens.

I feel very happy to live in Eastern Europe right about now. Sure, we might not have fancy lamborghinis like Monaco or London but at least if i go outside there aren't gangs of blacks that want to touch my girlfriend or arabs that chop my head off if i don't know Coran verses.
